message: The SDG_GOAL field for indicator 15-1-1, translated into en
data: 15 PROTECT, RECOVER AND PROMOTE THE SUSTAINABLE USE OF TERRESTRIAL ECOSYSTEMS, SUSTAINABLE MANAGEMENT OF FORESTS, COMBAT THE DESERTIFICATION, DETERMINATE AND REVERSE THE LAND DEGRADATION AND DETERMINE THE LOSS OF 6TH BIODIVERSITY6THE6TH6DAYDAY6THE6TH6DAY9TH6DAY9TH6DAY9TH6DAY6THE6TH6DAYDAY6TH6DAY9TH6DAY9TH6DAY6THE6THE6TH6DAYDAY6THE6THE6TH6DAYDAY6THE6THE9TH6DAY9TH6THETH6THE9THE9THDAYDAYTHE6TH6THE9TH6THE9THDAYDAYTHE6TH6THETH6THE9THE9THDADDESS OF 6TH BIODIVERSITY.
